# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits. Considering its quality and the unique features it provides, I believe it's truly worth more than its face value. I am offering this remarkable product to you for $15000. I trust that you will find its value exceeds your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this incredible opportunity yours. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
